summary: A well respected man residing in what's left of old-Beijing attempts to exonerate his son from his wrongdoings with his own methods and beliefs.
cast: Xiaogang Feng|Hanyu Zhang|Qing Xu|Kris Wu|Yifeng Li|Hua Liu|Ju-Gang Bai|Jun Du|Shan Jiang|Yiming Lian|Jing Liang|Nuo Lu|Hao Ning|Yuxian Shang|Zeru Tao|Sheng Wang|Hewei Yu|Yi Zhang|Yishan Zhang|Yansong Zhao
title: Lao pao er
